title: Synthesis, characterization, and antibacterial study of chitosan–zinc oxide nanocomposite-coated superhydrophobic cotton fabric
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33774-33783
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05950F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kranti S. Kachare, Shital S. Shendage, Shirishkumar B. Vhanbatte, Fu D. Mai, Anil Vithal Ghule
A facile green, cost-effective and scalable pad-dry-cure method produces mechanically stable, superhydrophobic and wash-durable multifunctional CS–ZnO CF for antibacterial application.
